This action is irreversible.
chatbox.disabled: This session is only visible as an archive.

home.deleteSessionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.
home.noContact: Add a contact to get started
home.noCurrentOrFutureSessions: No session in progress or planned

admin.passwordPrompt: Enter the password. Please note: it will no longer be recoverable.

surveys.codeIndication: The instructor should have given you a personal code. If not, please write your email address.
surveys.gender: What gender do you identify as?

education.title: What is the highest grade, degree or level of education you achieved?

consent.intro: You are invited to participate in a scientific study to design, validate and apply vocabulary tests.
consent.ok: I agree to participate in the study as described above.
consent.participationD: If you agree to participate, you will only need to complete this questionnaire and possibly another test, if indicated by the person administering the test.
consent.privacy: How will your data be processed and stored?
consent.privacyD:
The data collected (your answers to the various questions) will be treated confidentially and anonymously. 
They will be kept after their complete anonymization and can only be used for scientific or educational purposes. 
They may possibly be shared with other researchers or teachers, but always within this strictly research or teaching framework.
consent.rights:
What are your rights? 
Voluntary participation and possible withdrawal
consent.rightsD:
Your participation in this study is voluntary. 
You can decide to no longer participate in the study at any time without having to give a reason. 
You can also request that your data be deleted at any time. 
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this study, you can contact the study leader, Serge Bibauw, at the following address:
consent.title: Information document and informed consent

surveys.loginUser: Log in via a user account
surveys.loginWarning: In order to remember your progress, you need to be authenticated to access this questionnaire. If you have a user account, please log in. Otherwise, you can either register or continue with an email address.

register.birthyear.note: In what year were you born?
register.confirmTutor: Do you confirm selecting “{NAME}” as your guardian?

consent.intro:
You are invited to participate in a scientific study. 
The objective of this study is to understand how tutors and foreign language learners interact during online tutoring sessions. 
The data collected will be used to improve online tutoring tools and to better understand cognitive processes on both sides.
consent.ok: I agree to participate in the study as described above.
consent.participationD:
If you agree to participate, you will be invited to participate in online tutoring sessions with a foreign language tutor. You will also be asked to complete questionnaires before and after the tutoring sessions. Tutoring sessions will be recorded for later analysis.

We ask that you plan to complete a minimum of 8 one-hour sessions of tutoring (so 8 hours in total), over a period of 1 to 3 months. You can of course make more if you wish. However, you can stop participating in the study at any time.
consent.privacy: How will your data be processed and stored?
consent.privacyD:
Data collected (e.g., conversation transcripts, test results, typing metrics, participant information such as age or gender) will be treated confidentially and anonymously. 
They will be kept after their complete anonymization and can only be used for scientific or educational purposes. 
They may possibly be shared with other researchers or teachers, but always within this strictly research or teaching framework.
consent.rights:
What are your rights? 
Voluntary participation and possible withdrawal
consent.rightsD:
Your participation in this study is voluntary. 
You can decide to no longer participate in the study at any time without having to give a reason. 
You can also request that your data be deleted at any time. 
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this study, you can contact the study leader, Serge Bibauw, at the following address:

studyData.projectD: AI Tutoring in Language Learning (FNRS CDR 2024-2026)
studyData.studyD: Longitudinal study of foreign language tutoring
studyData.title: Study information

consent.title: Information document and informed consent

weekly.questions[0]: How many hours of course in {lang} have you taken?
weekly.questions[1]: How many hours have you watched videos in {lang} (films, series, Youtube...) or listened to content in {lang} (podcasts, radio , university courses, etc.)?
weekly.questions[2]: How many hours have you read texts in {lang} (book, newspaper, comics, websites, etc.)?
weekly.questions[3]: How many hours have you spoken in {lang} (discussions with friends, family, colleagues, etc.)?
